response.overview: Dafei, a complete failure in life, is unexpectedly chosen to compete in an alien-hosted tournament that will decide Earth’s survival. Through the trials, he gradually overcomes his selfishness and insecurity, shedding his self-destructive habits. In the end, he unites with the very people he once resented and dismissed—his ‘social circle adversaries,’ the marginalized masses—to save the planet together.

production_companies.name: 坏猴子（上海）文化传播有限公司

response.title: 疯狂的外星人2

titles.title: Feng Kuang De Wai Xing Ren 2
